name: Larry The Ghost Destroyer
description:
Please Read before Playing!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move;

Mouse to Aim;

Left Click to Shoot.

Story:

In "Larry the Ghost Destroyer" you play as Larry. Larry is a ghost destroyer, and after being called to a house to deal with a ghost, he falls throught the floor and into a secret room, where he meets the ghost, who seems friendly at first, but looks can be misleading.
